text: Ne Abakhasi baleshelwe baliinde okhula amaswamila kataru. Neshibachamilwa okhufisa shia- Nyasaye yaloonga mutsimbeleshelo tsiabu tawe - Nibali mbu basuubila mu Nyasaye nende inyanga yeyindukho, Ne Abasatsa babu bali nende obuchami bwokhubakalusia nibenya okhukasia omuleembe, Nabo abakhasi bali nende ebilachilo shinga balachilwa mumalako. Ne Abasatsa balikho hekulu wabu okhubashila, Ne Nyasaye niwa Amaani Owamachesi muno
